JoinRequestDialog.title: Sangisa na chambre .
JoinRequestDialog.inviteOnly: Oyo ezali chambre privée mpe esengaka ba invitations mpo na kosangana .
JoinRequestDialog.knockRequired: Salle oyo esengaka application e joindre. Finá na butɔ oyo ezali awa na nse mpo na kotinda mokanda ya kosangisa .
JoinRequestDialog.canJoin: Oyo eza chambre public, okoki ko joindre directement .

MessageList.noMessages: Nsango ezali naino te, tinda nsango ya liboso mpo na kobanda lisolo!

MessageVirturalList.noMessages: Nsango ezali naino te, tinda nsango ya liboso mpo na kobanda lisolo!
